message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $1,450,000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. I'm confident we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. I believe it's a more reasonable price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, while I appreciate your offer,  $1,300,000 is still lower than my minimum acceptable price. Let's compromise.  I'm willing to come down to $1,400,000. This price is still fair, and it provides you with a good value for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,350,000. I believe this price is a fair reflection of the value I'll get from the product.
